import { useState } from 'react'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; function CreateProductsPage() { const handleClickSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; const [input, setInput] = useState({ product: '', priceProduct: '', amountProduct: '', typeOfProduct: '', ImageProduct: '', }); const handleChangeInput = (e) => { console.log(input); setInput({ ...input, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return (
); } export default CreateProductsPage;
